subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: John Maine tossed six scoreless innings and struck out five before leaving due to a stomach virus, and the Mets improved to 19-9 in May, winning 5 of 6 at home.
snippet: John Maine tossed six scoreless innings and struck out five before leaving due to a stomach virus, and the Mets improved to 19-9 in May, winning 5 of 6 at home.
